import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { const stats = [ { number: '500+', label: 'Projects Completed' }, { number: '50+', label: 'Happy Clients' }, { number: '5+', label: 'Years Experience' }, { number: '24/7', label: 'Support Available' } ]; return (

About Our Company

We are a team of passionate innovators dedicated to creating digital solutions that make a difference. Our mission is to transform ideas into reality through cutting-edge technology and creative excellence.

🎯

Mission-Driven

Every project we undertake is guided by our commitment to excellence and innovation.

🚀

Innovation First

We stay ahead of the curve with the latest technologies and methodologies.

🤝

Client-Focused

Your success is our success. We work closely with clients to achieve their goals.

💼
Professional Team
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
); }; export default About;
